For those with amount of exercise being little (A=0) and quality of diet being poor (B=0), the probability of overall health being good (C=1) is 0.3337.

For those with amount of exercise being ample (A=1) and quality of diet being poor (B=0), the probability of overall health being good (C=1) is 0.4200. 
For those with amount of exercise being ample (A=1) and quality of diet being healthy (B=1), the probability of overall health being good (C=1) is 0.5014. 
For those with overall health being poor (C=0), the probability of longevity being long lifespan (D=1) is 0.4573. 
For those with overall health being good (C=1), the probability of longevity being long lifespan (D=1) is 0.8009.
